headline: Emerson Electric Set For Growth In The Second Half Of 2025
summary: Emerson Electric targets growth in megatrends like aerospace, energy, and automation while managing risks and reducing debt. Click to find out why EMR is a Buy.

headline: US oil and gas rig count falls to lowest since January, Baker Hughes says
summary: (Reuters) -U.S. energy firms this week cut the number of oil and natural gas rigs operating to their lowest since January, energy services firm Baker Hughes said in its closely followed report on Friday.  Baker Hughes said this week's decline puts the total rig count down 25, or 4% below this time last year.  Baker Hughes said oil rigs fell by five to 474 this week, their lowest since January, while gas rigs were unchanged at 101.

headline: US oilfield giants brace for tough times as price slide rattles producers
summary: (Reuters) -Top U.S. oilfield service firms have signaled a challenging period ahead as a recent slide in oil prices pushes producers to temper their drilling activity and rethink their budgets.  Higher output from the OPEC+ grouping and a global tariff war that has raised demand concerns drove crude prices to near $55 a barrel this month, from around $78 just before U.S. President Donald Trump assumed office in January.  "With oil prices falling out of the well-defined range that had persisted for much of the past 2+ years, producer budgets are encountering meaningful strain for the first time in several years," said Raymond James analysts.
